And now, to the story:


Every story has a monster which is the personification of Evil, a malevolent creature bent on destruction of most characters surrounding it. Fine examples of such beasts are the monsters who lurks under the bed of kids and children. But it’s not always this the case.

George is a Monster with the hellish duty of lurking under children beds. He hadn’t been one for all of his life but, had steadily worked in Hell until he finally got promoted and assigned to lurk under their beds to scare them and instill terror and fear in their little hearts, which was then collected to resupply the dark energies powering the lowest level of Pandemonium, the Hell Capital.

He’s not evil per se, he’s just doing his job.

Nonetheless, when night came and he moved his scaly reptilian body out from under the bed, although it was pitch black in the room, he could see that something seemed amiss. He had gotten used to kids room, usually filled with toys and dollies, with stars and starships if the kid was a boy and with animals and castles if it belonged to a girl. But the room he was in that night was way different from any he had ever seen.

Posters with menacing figures on the walls, explosions painted on the ceiling, a lone mirror placed strategically to give the owner a full view of the room directly from the bed.

And there seemed to be only one color in that room.

Black.

Strange.

Still, George was here to do a job.

He had to scare and, possibly, eat whoever was sleeping on the bed. And he counted to do so.

Walking on all fours he began stalking toward the bed, like a tiger would do when hunting its prey, his almost reptilian body shimmered a bit under the moon light coming from the window, his barbed tail swishing behind him. Moving closer and closer to the bed he could see the faint outline of the figure under the covers, and through such tiny detail he figured out that she was a young girl sleeping, although not yet mature enough to ignore monsters such as himself.

Silently he moved closer, his claws extending from his front paws, as he readied himself to strike.

Right at that moment, though, the girl seemed to stir and, in the moment he took to freeze himself, he heard a surprised whisper and a quick movement coming from the bed. Growing worried, George moved closer and realized that his victim had managed to see him, somehow, and had applied the duvet tactic.

Growling in frustration he inched closer noticing that the duvet was extra thick and managed to create an impenetrable shield surrounding his would-be victim. George hated how kids were getting smarter and smarter these days. Somehow, thanks to some Intern Monster, probably, one kid had learned that Duvet covers were effective defenses against Monsters attacks.

From then on, all kids used this tactic to protect themselves.

As he got beside the bed he stared at the formidable shield that the girl was using noticing that it was a massively heavy thing, extra-long, which managed to reach almost down to the floor, making it impossible for him even to return under the bed.
But he suddenly noticed that there was a way for him to get at the girl.

As heavy as the duvet was, the girl breathing was still stable and that could only mean that she had a way to get oxygen from the outside. Walking around the bed he soon found that this girl had combined two defensive tactics into one, the first being the duvet bunkering, the second being the snorkeling technique.

Through the usage of a long snorkel, coming out of the impenetrable shield, she managed to get clean fresh air, even though she was covered entirely by the heavy duvet. With a smile on his lips, revealing his sharp razor like fangs, George moved closer to the tube, noticing how air came out of it and was sucked in and, at the same time, how the girl middle seemed to grow larger and smaller as she breathed.

This gave him an idea.

Opening his mouth wide and taking in as much air as he could, he suddenly closed his jaws on the tube creating with his lips a vacuum like seal around it, preventing any air to get out, with this done he breathed out into the tube with all of his might.

At first there was a bit of resistance but, after a few moments, he managed to overcome it and suddenly noticed how the girl middle suddenly grew bigger under the cover.

Knowing that in this way he could finally manage to get the girl to uncover herself from her shield indirectly he began pushing more and more air into the tube, watching with fascination how the girl figure began to swell, rising higher and higher, lifting the duvet bit by bit.

Feeling himself victorious, George, began to pump faster and faster into the tube, focusing only on pushing more and more air in the snorkel to finally get a chance at scaring the girl.

Meanwhile, the girl found herself unable to do anything. She had thought to be safe using the duvet and her dad’s snorkel but now something was pushing air into her through the same tube.

Slowly, the girl body began to grow, first her middle which started to get rounder, filling up with air, as it began to grow higher and higher, similar to a hill as it pulled the duvet from the floor as it rose up in the air. Then, slightly above that, two additional hills seemed to sprout suddenly, growing larger and wider, as a creaking sound started to fill the room as George kept pumping faster and faster.

The girl tried to move her arms, to free herself from the snorkeling tube but, under her heavy cover she realized she couldn’t manage to move freely and so could only hope that whatever was out there would stop sooner, rather than later.

George instead was feeling elated. He stole a quick glance toward the bed, where he could see that the figure on it was growing rounder and rounder, rising higher and higher, taking more and more of the heavy cover from the bed. Already he could see the tips of the toes emerging from under it and so, he re-doubled his efforts to pump even more air into his victim.

The girl, meanwhile, was growing massively round. Her body growing into a massive sphere, engulfing both her arms and legs as it expanded wider and wider, her breasts, tightly kept in check by her currently too tight bra, growing bigger and bigger as they inflated with each pumped bout of air coming from the snorkel still stuck in her mouth.

She closed her eyes, feeling like she couldn’t hold anymore within herself, as she tried both to cry and scream at the same time, unable to do either of them.

George, instead, kept pumping more and more, using all of his lungs power to aid him in his task, feeling excited since he already could see the duvet leaving unguarded the legs of his victim, and yet her face was still under it, protected from that impenetrable shield. If he could manage to pump a little bit more into her, just enough to uncover her face, he would have won this battle.

As he kept pushing more and more air into the massively gravid sphere that the girl had become, a loud creaking sound filled the room, sounding like a ticking bomb waiting for its sudden release.

Just as George was able to see the eyes of his victim getting freed from the heavy duvet, a loud ripping sound filled the room, quickly followed by a loud crackling sound as he suddenly was right in the middle of a massive explosion.

As the room returned silent, George stood beside the bed, his lips still closed to the snorkeling tube, laying uselessly in front of him.

He stared silently around the room trying to understand what had happened when a pair of red lacy bras flew down from the ceiling landing right on his head.

The room was squared and had a massive mahogany rounded table in the middle, all around this table ten people sat, sharply dressed and with plenty of notes and charts placed on the surface of the same.

These people were right in the middle of a debate as Gorge entered the room.

The current councilor speaking was debating with one of his colleagues about the true need of issuing new health regulation around the campus.

First, we would be seen, as a college, as the first to take into consideration the growing issue of body shaming within the student body.

Second, by letting some private companies to open their establishments within the campus, we would generate additional income that will benefit both the college structure and the services we can provide to our students.

Third, as a College council, seeing us issue new mandates and regulation about the Health of our student body can only generate positive reviews on this council, thus granting us more power to issue definite responses to any kind of issue that could arise within the College grounds.

Think about it, with a few, well applied and constructed regulation we could have a more peaceful setting within our grounds, for both the teachers and the student body.

For sure, I don’t need you to remind last year incident of the City parade. Precisely of the actions that a certain group of students took to sabotage the parade, with all the negative reviews we received for our inability to stop them before it was too late.

No, we need these new regulations implemented, as fast as we can.”

As the debate seemed to carry on, the Rector raised his hands, taking the word.

“Sarah, we all understand your points and, by the forecasting examples you’ve previously shown to us we can agree that we all will gain from following your, and your team, suggestion but, what kind of regulations you are exactly talking about?”

As the rector said that, Gorge moved silently behind him, influencing his mind more, making him more receptive toward the idea of a fattened-up student body being a calmer, more peaceful mass of usually hyperactive kids with a mean streak.

Sarah Johnson, the woman that had fallen the most for Gorge influence, took again the word.

“We are suggesting implementing a schedule for a more Healthy approach toward life in the Campus, to teach our students that a healthy body is a sane body.

For example, a mandatory four meals per day plan within the Campus, including Breakfast, Lunch, Afternoon Meal and Dinner, granting some extended time at such mealtimes in order to facilitate the student’s acceptance of a proper diet.

Another example is an application of the portion size and meal consistency, enforcing into our students the need to have a proper balanced diet of all foodtypes. Granting students possibility to have a snack during class, as is well known that attention span tends to vanish after hours of long lectures.”

As the woman kept talking, each of the member of the council began to silently nod in approval until, as the woman was going to propose a new example, the Rector raised his hand once more.

“Alright, Sarah. I believe that is with the unanimous approval of this council that we give you the assignment of carrying on with these new Healthy regulations to be applied within the Campus, but I must add that not only the students body should follow said rules.

As we are the representative of the College, we too must lead by example.

Session adjourned.”


As the session dwindled to an end, Gorge quickly implanted more and more of his plans onto the weak minds of the humanz surrounding him, quickly reinforcing within each of them the need to have this plan come true.

In the following days, a widespread campaign began to make its appearance in the campus grounds, huge posters promoting a healthier approach to life in College, as lists of the new regulations and mandatory rules to be followed were slowly distributed within the grounds.

At first the students didn’t seem particularly happy about these new rules but, as more and more private companies made their appearance with their establishments in the college grounds and, with the realization from the student body of the advantages of following the newly prescribed rules, soon all of the student body began to quietly follow.

Gorge, as he roamed aimlessly throughout the campus could already see that the new regulations were starting to have an effect and yet, everyone seemed to be happy enough that nobody raised any real ruckus about the current Healthy regulations.
But those were only the steppingstones for a wider plan.

As the new rules were accepted and more cash began to enter into the treasury of the College administration, all council members began to apply some variants to the original regulations, forcing the students body to follow the guidelines, without any real clue of what would happen to them.

A couple of months after, for example, since the start of the Healthy living campaign, the mandatory meals had increased to six per day, forcing students to have at least two courses at each mealtime.

Of course, since the entirety of the student body had by now grown used to have four meals a day, adding a few more wasn’t seen as a major issue. As these changes started to appear as the new normalcy, the Campus grounds began to change also in other aspect of the common life of the average student.

Plastic girls and bullies within the grounds dropped drastically, especially since a new trend seemed to appear in all classes. The larger size of the average person wasn’t anymore object of ridiculousness, but instead something that everyone seemed to actively try to reach at their own pace.

She sat there, shoveling food into her maw, barely tasting whatever was in front of her, fueled only by the almost endless hunger she was now constantly feeling at every hour of the day.

The ex-cheerleader had ballooned massively in those months of constant indulging, barely able to walk on her own, with her legs resembling more pillars of jelly like flesh, her arms having grown so massive she was barely able to move them unaided. King Kong had been the ruler of Skull Island for a long time.

And for such a long time he had imposed his rules to any beast and creature that lived there with him. He was aware of the tiny little beings that had built the wooden mountain to protect themselves and he always had accepted their offerings.

But the last offering they had given him had been different from the rest.

This time it was a terrified little thing, a tiny little creature like no other he had ever seen. For some reason, this little creature, while being afraid of him, was also fascinated with him. He often caught it staring at himself not with fear but, with curiosity. It was such a new feeling that he decided to keep it with himself, although it was so different with him, maybe he wouldn’t feel so alone with her at his side.


Ann Darrow was utterly terrified.

First being kidnapped by those tribesmen and then given as a sacrificial offering to that massive monster. She had really thought she was going to die then and there. And yet, the monster had plucked her from the palisade and brought her through the forest up to his cave.

At first she tried to run off, to escape from there as she wanted to reunite with her friends but, seeing as the island was full of mortal dangers and that the monster had come back to save her, she decided to wait her friends there. The beast, although as big as a building, did not seem completely savage. She had noticed that it always had seemed rather delicate when it was handling her.

Also, and she thought that this idea was coming from her fear addled mind, the creature, Kong, seemed rather intrigued by her.

As a few days passed, she did notice that Kong was getting rather affectionate toward her.

He, she didn’t notice that she had stopped thinking about him as a ‘it’, couldn’t talk obviously but there was almost no need for it. It was as if she could understand what he wanted from her simply by looking at his eyes.

Ann could see a deep sadness into those eyes and, it was probably due to that, that the situation evolved with her no longer a prisoner but, more of a guest. Being a guest, when Kong wasn’t around, she began exploring his lair. After her first attempts at escape, he had moved her to a cave atop one of the tallest mountain on the isle. With nothing better to do she explored it quite a bit, managing to find loads of bones from previous offerings and even a few items from her own world.

As she found a mangled and torn jacket, she smiled within herself as she found an old lighter into one of the pockets. That night, as Kong returned, she managed to make him slowly approach to the concept of fire. As she did so, she realized, more than before, that the monster was more like a little child of immense strength.

Still, one problem seemed to arise quickly. She was starving.

True, he had brought her some fruits, actually a man-sized mountain of it, but try as she might, she couldn’t stomach it. She ate those fruits with gusto but, she never managed to digest them. Feeling weaker and weaker, she tried to let him understand that she was in need of something more substantial, something that could give her energies.

Be it that Kong managed to understand, or sheer luck, the following day he returned to his lair, laying atop of one of the tallest mountains, bringing with him a chunk as big as his hand of some kind of meat. Ann, as much as her hunger drove her toward the massive piece of meat, she managed to restrain herself and, using the lighter managed to get started a little fire over which she cooked some of the meat.

The smell coming from it not only made Ann’s stomach rumble, but it also attracted Kong, as he curiously peered toward the little pet he had grown so attached, watching it as it played with the bright thing that created warm and burned. Motionlessly, he stared as his little pet place some of the meat he had brought over the bright warm thing and got immediately curious as the meat began to change in smell, becoming rather more interesting.

As Ann finished cooking the piece of meat she had managed to carve from the massive chunk he had brought, she noticed that Kong was curious about it. Smiling, as if she was with a friend, and not a monster that had captured her, she offered the cooked meat to him.

The massive ape saw that his little pet was giving him what it had made but, he also knew that the pet was starving. For this reason he sat down near her, tearing a chunk of raw meat and began eating. Ann, notice Kong starting to eat and so she too did the same. As she gave a bite to the slab of cooked meat, she moaned in pleasure. This was just what she needed. As soon as she had cleared the slab of meat, she quickly began cooking a couple more, one for herself since she was still pretty hungry…but the others were for her friend.

Having almost forgotten who she was and where she was, she wanted to have him taste cooked food, trying, without really knowing, to make him more humane.

Kong had to admit that having decided to take care of that tiny pet was one of the best decisions he’d ever had. Not only it seemed to be able to understand him, so he didn’t feel lonely anymore, but it also proved to be rather intelligent, for a thing of that size.

The meat he had always eaten raw was good but, that same meat placed on the bright warm thing was somewhat better. Knowing this, and with the help of his pet, Kong began to learn, by trial and error, how to make the meat of his preys tastier. With that knowledge learned, he decided to make a surprise to his pet.

It was almost two weeks since he had taken the little pet with him, in that time he had found a few creatures similar to his pet lurking around his lair but he managed to scare them off or kill them, when he managed to capture them. Still, he wanted to make a surprise to his pet and so, after having battled one of those big lizards, he grabbed it and brought it over the only other thing that he knew was bright, warm and burned.
Dragging the corpse to the Volcano hadn’t been really easy but, as he used a tree as he had seen the pet doing, he began to let the massive corpse roast slowly.

In those weeks he had done his best to learn how to make the meat tastier over the bright warm thing and now he wanted to show off his prowess to his pet.


It was getting late, the sun was vanishing behind the horizon and yet, Ann had seemingly forgotten of being there as a prisoner, or of her friends that were probably still searching for her. As the sun set, she could only worry about Kong. He had been so gentle, and she had real fun in teaching him how to cook meat over the fire, although she was not an expert at all. Still, Kong had seemed rather interested in learning, or maybe she was just getting delusional about the whole situation.

She had heard him roar that same morning, several times in fact, and since he didn’t seem to be coming back already she was fearing the worst. That was until she felt the breeze change direction and a new smell came to her. It was the smell of cooked meat but, it was so powerful that she wondered if the forest at the base of the mountain was actually burning.

Then, suddenly, Kong appeared in front of her, leaving right in front of her widened eyes a massive dead dinosaur. As she watched the carcass with the weak fire she had made, she realized that the smell of cooked meat was coming right from that corpse.

Looking closely she saw that the thing skin was frazzled and burned.

Shocked she turned her amazed stare at the massive ape beside her. Kong saw that his pet seemed rather happy and he was feeling just the same. Still, he motioned her to eat.

He knew that his pet had been starving and so, with this gift he wanted it to grow big and strong.

Ann, helping herself with a rough cutting stone, took out a chunk of meat out of the massive corpse and, although a bit worried, she gave it a big bite. Once again, the taste of that meat was divine against her taste buds, rapidly she polished the chunk she had taken but, seeing as Kong still pushed her a bit toward the corpse she realized that he had brought that only for her.

‘Does he really think I can eat all this on my own?’ she though worried.

Still, seeing as Kong was staring at her, she quickly began taking chunks out of the carcass, making sure to avoid the internal organs of the thing. After a while though, feeling full to burst, she collapsed on her back, her stomach bloated to maximum capacity, having burst out of the camisole she had been wearing up to that moment.

She saw Kong peer at her curious, but all she could do was make circular motion atop of her belly, as she slowly drifted to sleep.

Kong, seeing as his pet fell asleep, quickly took part of the carcass for himself, enjoying the flavor of it, while promising himself to bring as many as these gifts to his pet. In his animal mind, if his pet was that small it was only because it did not eat enough. So, the only logical solution was to have his pet eat more, so that one day Kong was going to have his pet as big as he was.

Ann Darrow permanence on Skull Island seemed to be permanent.

She hadn’t the faintest clue of where her friends were, although knowing the place they all were, she was mostly wishing they had managed to escape safely, instead of waiting for her return. This way of thinking came mostly from the extremely good treatment that she was getting from Kong.

The humongous Ape had truly taken her in sympathy, as she saw it, for each and every day, sometime even multiple times each day, he brought her something cooked for her to eat. Since the episode with the massive dinosaur, he seemed to realize that she couldn’t eat all that much and so he had started to bring her treats of smaller size. Although, this created a new problem all of its own.

That day for example, as the sun shined right above their heads, Kong had brought to her a four hundred pounds tiger or something like that. She noticed that he had brought her the carcass without ‘cooking’ it first, as if he wanted to have her approval.

She naturally complimented him for the catch but, before he could bring it away to be ‘cooked’ she motioned him to wait. At first, he didn’t seem to understand but, as she signed with her hands, he remembered that she had done similar gestures when she had thought him of the bright warm thing. Interested, Kong waited as he began to see that his pet was doing something to the meal, he had brought to her.

Ann, still no more a survivalist as any other woman of her times, knew that with all the fur covering it, that tiger like thing couldn’t just be cooked over a fire. So, using her roughly sharpened stone she tried again and again until she managed to remove the fur and the skin from the carcass, all of her motions always being observed by Kong.

With the animal skinned, although roughly so, Ann brought some pieces of it over the fire, leaving them to cook, as much as she could at least. The ape was not sure why his pet worked so hard on that prey but considering the results with the meat over the bright warm thing, he was willing to try and emulate what he had just seen.

For the time being, since he wanted to surprise anew his pet, Kong brought back to her large chunks of meat already warmed. As he watched her eat those chunks, hearing her throaty sounds of satisfaction, he was feeling something akin to satisfaction. His pet was not one of his own, but, as he had observed it he was starting to realize that it seemed to be a miniature copy of him, with much less fur. So, he decided to do all he could to keep it happy.

Ann, as days passed with these constant feasts noticed that her clothes seemed to be tighter on her body than she remembered but, considering she had bigger things to worry about, she quickly dismissed that thought for a later time. Then, after one of the cooked meals provided to her by Kong, she suddenly noticed that after eating her ‘lunch’ she had been nibbling one of the few fruits that Kong had brought to her.

The same that at first, she didn’t seem able to digest. As she kept consuming it with little bites, she began to believe that probably her body had began adjusting to the food of that island, which meant that she had actually a good survival chance there.
As much as she enjoyed the slabs of cooked meats that Kong brought to her, over and over, she knew that her body was in need also of fruit and herbs to survive, so finding out that she could digest them, finally let her be much more at ease about her permanence on the island.

It was then that she realized she had completely lost any hope of returning to her home on the mainland. At first, she was a bit saddened by it but, considering that she was guest to a massive, powerful and proud creature which seemed to be happy in making Her happy, she realized that there wasn’t much back home that could be of equal value. Still, when she motioned to Kong, that evening, that she could have also fruits, he began bringing her both the cooked meat and the fruits he found around the island.

Ann, not wanting to offend her friend, tried her best to show to him how much she enjoyed his gifts.

Day after day, a sort of routine began to take place.

Every day, when the sun was at the top and when it was setting, Kong would bring to his lair, and to his pet, both the meat and the fruits, always by the, for him, handful, passing then some time with the tiny creature ‘speaking’ and learning. Still, when roughly a month had passed since Ann’s arrival in his lair, he felt himself ready to show her what had he learned in those weeks while he had been ‘hunting’.

When night came, Ann patted her still somewhat full stomach.

That day she had felt particularly hungry, with no real reason to say the truth, and so she had enjoyed thoroughly the meals that her friend had brought her at lunch, while nibbling on what remained of it and on the fruits, which she had somewhat stockpiled in the freshness of the lair, throughout the day. Now, as evening was setting, she felt her tummy rumbling a bit, as if nervous that her now scheduled evening meal seemed to be late.

Still, sitting near the cave on some soft mushroom’s heads, she waited for her friend to arrive. As it had become usual, she smelled the air first, since at around that time the wind changed direction and brought to her nostrils a delicious scent, a bit different than usual. As she stood up, she saw the massive head of her friend coming into her view but, what surprised her the most was that he had brought with him something different this time. Something that made her happy and enticed her very much.

Within his arms, laying on some palm leaves, there was a large piece of meat, roasted to a fire but, with some fruits around it. As she saw the gift he had brought her, she realized that it was yet another thing he had learned from just by watching her. As her dinner was brought in front of her, and she looked at it more carefully, she realized that it had to be one of the same tigers he had brought to her a couple of weeks before. She noticed that since the meat had been carved just as she had done previously, removing the organs and the skin.

Beaming in happiness, she turned toward her friend and hugged one of his fingers in happiness, something that she had started doing recently to try and let him be aware of how happy he was making her.

Kong saw how ecstatic his pet had been at his surprise and was glad for it. He had tried himself that strange warm meat with fruits but, he didn’t seem to notice anything different from any other warmed meats. Still, since his pet was so happy, he was happy himself. Also to his delight, he saw that the pet greedily went at the warmed meat with fruits, managing to eat almost half of it before collapsing in a digestive sleep.

As the days progressed more or less in the same way, Kong began to notice that his little pet was finally starting to grow and to eat more than before. For the massive Ape it had to be a sign of good health if his pet was growing and so, he began to bring to his lair, slightly bigger preys and more fruits, than before. The tiny creature didn’t seem to notice the change, as it continued happily to eat whatever he brought to it.

It was true, Ann had grown so addicted to the flavors of the various kind of meats and fruits that Kong brought to her that she barely noticed how larger her portion were becoming week after week. Only when her clothes began to rip and tear, she wondered about her figure for a while, on how what she was eating was affecting her physique. But, as she mulled it over, considering also the fact that she hadn’t had a bath in almost a month and that her clothes were continuously under stress by the harshness of the place she was, she voluntarily rejected the idea of her gaining weight, deciding to wait some more substantial proofs before starting to worry.

So she basically did nothing about it, simply continuing to eat every meals brought to her, while passing the rest of her day working on a special project of hers and nibbling on fruits. As weeks passed, as she basically kept her lazy lifestyle, eating whatever Kong brought to her and snacking while waiting for her main meals, she kept growing larger and fatter. It was by no means a large difference but, already some parts of her began jiggling more than they ever did before.

Still, as much as she was enjoying the meals that her friend brought to her every day, she still wanted to try and teach as much as she could to her friend, trying at her best to making him more ‘humane’.

For that reason, during the idle time between one meal and the other, she began to work out something like the sign language that the mutes had been using for centuries.

By error and trial, she began to create come sort of scheme that she hoped would be useful to ‘talk’ with Kong. She knew that her friend wasn’t just a beast, Kong was way more than intelligent than anyone had ever thought before, as it was shown by his interest in learning and in taking care of her well being for so long.

1552211.content:
It was now Ann’s third month on the island, of her friends no trace but she wasn’t actually thinking about them any longer.

As it had happened before, she had begun to ‘teach’ herself the raw sign language she had managed to put together. In doing so, she was acutely aware that Kong was, at first, curiously staring at her and then he began to actively participate. That was a stepping stone in her relationships with her friend, although it was difficult since she couldn’t actually force him to follow her signs, she nonetheless kept trying, hoping to fill the communication gap between her and Kong.

The ape himself wasn’t actually that interested at first.

He had thought, at first, that his pet was doing something interesting as it had done before but, apparently it was not like that, at all. Still, seeing as it seemed to be trying its hardest to make him go through, and the fact that it appeared much more appreciative of the gifts he kept bringing, Kong began to try and follow what his pet was trying to do.

It was a couple of days already that his pet kept doing the same thing over and over, pointing to one of the meals while making something with its fingers until, finally, Kong began to see what it was trying to do. Just as he communicated with roars, his pet was trying to teach him some sort of language. Realizing that what he had been nursing in his lair wasn’t just some kind of dumb animal, Kong began to get actively interested in the language that his pet was showing.

It took some time, and much grievance for both Kong and Ann but, in barely one month Kong and Ann had finally some way of communicating with each other, although it was very slow and hard to do at first.

“I am Ann. I am human. You…?”
“I am Kong. I am…Me.”

“This is your home. My home is far away.”
“This is my territory. This is your home.”

“I like your home. But my home is far away. I will stay with Kong for long time.”
“Kong like Ann. Kong defend Ann. Kong bring food to Ann. Ann is at home with Kong”

In this way Both Ann and Kong began to talk with each other, as she tried to explain him what she was and from where she came from, while Kong realized that what he had brought to his lair so long ago wasn’t just a pet but a creature like him.

Still, as much as they talked and joked and played together, Kong never told Ann of how he was trying to get her to grow as strong as he was. In truth, Ann was so focused on teaching Kong that she didn’t seem to be aware of how much her permanence there had changed her. As three months had passed already, he figure had vastly inflated from the svelte model she had been when arriving on that island.

Between the lazy lifestyle, as she still passed most of her time sitting or laying down waiting for Kong return, and the massively increasing meals that he constantly brought her, Ann had grown rather heavily chubby.

Her neck was now sporting a second chin, while her arms and legs, barely used anymore except for getting food into her mouth, had grown jiggly and covered by a soft layer of fat. Her breast too had grown, now way larger than the bra she had been wearing when she had arrived. But most of her growth was visible in both her hips and her belly. Her hips and ass had grown wider, forcing her thighs to touch against the other when she wasn’t consciously separating them, and her ass too had grown fuller and jigglier than before.

Her belly instead had completely burst out of the camisole she had worn up to some time ago, as she instead let it simply hang down as it started to grow over her most intimate parts. Naturally, she knew to have put on some weight, her bursting out of her dress was easy enough to recognize it as a sign but, considering the ‘harsh’ conditions in which she lived, she believed of having gained almost nothing.

Still, since going around naked wasn’t exactly her style, helping herself with some of her ripped clothing, she quickly made a rather fashionable bra of cloth with matching short’s like pants. For some reason, though, every week she found herself forced to adjust the clothes she had made for herself, and so being as she was growing lazier and lazier, she began to tinker with the idea of going around completely naked.

Kong, from his part, had noticed that Ann was seemingly growing, although she wasn’t actually growing as he had thought. Instead of growing taller and stronger, she seemed to be growing rather rounder and heavier. That baffled him, for he knew by his standards that eating made you bigger and stronger. Still, since he had nothing to lose, and Ann seemed to be enjoying it, he decided to keep providing her with food, although he kept increasing her portions, trying to see if maybe she would finally grow as big as himself.

As two weeks passed, seeing as she had just finished to eat her meal, which this time had been ‘one tiger cooked over fire and one pig’( seeing as Kong still did seem to have problems in distinguishing boars and pigs, Ann thought best to leave it at that for the moment) Ann burped quite loudly, as she rubbed her full, rounded out belly, with both hands, and yet she still felt herself craving for something more but different.

She loved how the various kinds of meats and fruits tasted but, the flavors she had enjoyed was starting to grow dull on her. This gave her an idea.

“Kong?”
“Ann?”

“There is only meat and fruit on your land?”
“There are preys. There are fruits. Ann needs more meat?”

“No…*urp*…. No. Ann is fine. Ann search for different prey than meat or fruit.”
“No-meat prey? Kong knows of no-meat preys. Ann need no-meat preys?”

“Ann would love that.”

Swiftly, since the sun was still high in the sky, Kong rose from his haunches and lifted Ann from the ground, having her sitting on his open hand as he began climbing down the mountain. Ann, for her part was feeling excited. This was the first time that her friend was bringing her out of the lair.

As she was comfortably seated into his hand, Ann enjoyed the rich jungle that Kong seemed to be crossing so easily. At that sight, though, she remembered of how many of her friends had lost their life as they had moved through it. Still, those bad memories were soon washed away as Kong had brought her to a wide open space out of the jungle, precisely on a hill facing an immense lake.

He carefully brought her to a tall rock formation, leaving her there as he turned back into the jungle for a moment. Being alone there, Ann marveled at how beautiful that place was, and yet, seeing as a few tigers were napping on a nearby hills, she also told herself that as beautiful it may have seemed, it was also very deadly.

After a few minutes, just as she was starting to get worried, she heard the heavy thumping of his friend as he marched back out of the jungle. As he came to stand in front of her, he had within his arms a few things that he knew as food but, that weren’t meat.

First, he offered her what she thought were some strange tubular thingies, being instead the thorax of local sugar ants. Grabbing one of those in her hands, seeing as Kong was showing her, she brought one end of the thing to her lips, tilting it toward the sky as a whitish sludge poured out from it. As soon as she tasted it, her eyes grew wide in surprise.

‘This is sugar! Extremely concentrated sugar! Mmmm…so good…’

Emptying the tube thing she was holding, feeling herself energized, she greedily tried to get her hands on another one but Kong denied her the pleasure.

“Ann have no more. Hurts belly. Kong knows. Ann like it?”
“Ann loves it. Ann thanks Kong for beautiful gift”

Kong was happy that he had managed to find something different for Ann to have, he still was having problems understanding what she needed to grow, since all he usually had was meat and fruits. Still, he knew of plenty of things that could be eaten in his island, although he usually didn’t need for them.

Kong waited a few minutes to pass, before giving Ann something else, for he knew from his experience that it was needed some time to recover from the sweet meat. Then, as Ann seemed more than ready to continue, he brough forward what seemed like a ripe orange like fruit, although the skin around it was rather tough looking and it was easily three times Ann size both in height and in width.

Kong grabbed the orange like fruit and broke it in half, revealing a yellowish paste inside of it. Balancing the two halves in his hands he first showed to Ann, by bringing the first one to his lips taking a quick bite/sip from it and swallowing it down. As Ann was trying to figure out how she could do the same with her own half, she didn’t see that after that little sip, Kong’s figure had softened a little bit already.

He inched the half fruit toward Ann, letting her scoop up a few handfuls of the strange fruit. At first, Ann, didn’t seem to taste anything out of the strange fruit but, as her taste buds began to get used to the sugary and spicy flavor of the thing, she began scooping out more and more out of it, sipping it as fast as she could, even bringing her face closer to the fruit so that she could have as much as possible.

Also this time, Kong, took the fruit away, motioning to Ann that she was going to be sick if she had more of it in such a short time. Ann, instead, after having swallowed more or less a bucket of that paste, felt positively buoyant, feeling herself as light as a feather, while she completely missed the fact that her body seemed to be growing fatter all over as time passed.

“Ann happy for no-meat food?”
“Kong made Ann so happy! Ann thanks much Kong.”

“Kong has more…Ann wait here. Kong come back soon…”

15522113.content:
Ann, sitting down on the rock formation was soon getting rather bored and seeing as Kong seemed to be still busy doing whatever he was doing into the jungle, she began to slowly climb down from the tall rocks where Kong had left her.

As she slowly moved down, she noticed that it was strangely harder than she remembered but, she quickly dismissed the thought as she had finally managed to climb down. Waddling slowly, for she had slowly grown fatter as time passed due to the strange orange like fruit she had eaten, she made her way toward the lake.

Swiftly taking out what little clothing she had on herself, she began walking into the water, feeling it be rather lukewarm. Slowly and cautiously she began to go deeper, until the water reached her middle, then she began to submerge herself, trying as much as she could to scrub herself from the grime covering her body. As she cleaned herself, she noticed that her body seemed rather softer than before but, still under the misconception of having put on only a few pounds, she promised herself that from the following day she was going to reduce a bit her indulgences.

As she bathed, she suddenly felt something brushing against her flank under the water. Turning swiftly on herself, she tried time and time again to see if something was near her or not but it was only when felt something chomp softly, and painlessly to her, on one of her belly rolls, that she managed to see what had been bothering her.

As she watched interested, she saw that it was some kind of catfish, although one she had never seen before. The fish had closed its toothless mouth around her belly roll, as if thinking it to be food, but did seem unable to let go on its own. Ann, feeling rather ticklish where the fish had chomped, tried to scroll it off of herself for a bit, but the only results she managed to get was to feel many other similar sensations all over her submerged body.

Getting rather afraid she began to waddle, although with difficulty, outside of the lake and there she was able to see what had happened.

All over her legs, her thighs and her belly, up to where she had been submerged, there wasn’t barely any space free from the bites of those strange fishes. Giggling a bit with herself, feeling like she was a human fishing rod, she walked onto the grass land and slowly managed to have all those catfishes fall off of her.

Feeling giddy for being, for once, the one useful in finding food she verified that there wasn’t any permanent damage on her skin and went back into the lake, shaking herself to see if she managed to entice even more of those strange fishes to her.

With her surprise, they kept coming at her, closing their mouths on her, and finding themselves stuck on her body. As she removed them for the forth time, she noticed that these fishes didn’t actually masticate their preys, preferring instead to swallow them wholes and that had to be the reason for which she was managing to find so many attached on her body.

As Ann kept doing her involuntary capture of those animals, she didn’t notice that lately the fish that were attracted to her shaking body were starting to grow bigger in size. As she dipped once more into the water, having already accumulated quite the small mountain of preys on the border of the lake, she suddenly felt something attach to her much strongly than before, almost dragging her away toward deeper waters.

Looking behind she couldn’t see much into the murky waters but, she did see some kind of shape right behind herself. Pushing with all of her strength, forcing her weakened and atrophied legs to work harder, she began to leave the waters and then she saw that a similar fish, although much bigger in size, had actually clamped its lips on her rear. Feeling rather afraid and worried, for she didn’t expect that such a beast could be living into the lake, she tried as hard as she could to get out of the waters.

Alas, the catfish who had taken her, was still partly underwater and was managing to bring her back in until, suddenly, she felt herself free from the grasp and fell forward, but managing to grab onto a few roots that were near the confines of the lake. Looking back, as she recovered her breath, she thought of seeing something dragging the catfish that had been on herself, back into the deeper waters.

As Ann recovered her breath, for she wasn’t used anymore to such feats of strength, she felt suddenly being dragged from behind, as if an invisible hand had taken her and brought swiftly into the lake. Surprised and afraid she began to try and swim forward only to suddenly feel something forcefully constricting her hips.

In an instant she found herself not anymore on the surface of the lake but well below it as a massive, hulking, catfish like beast had managed to get her up to her hips within its mouth. Screaming underwater, as she tried to punch back the thing that had taken her, she realized how foolish she had been.

Mesmerized by the beauty of the lake, she had underestimated its dangers.


Kong, meanwhile, had been making a little stockpile of those orange like fruits, knowing full well what effects those had usually on him, as well as gathering a few more plants and fruits that he could bring to Ann to make her happy.

As he emerged from the jungle, he immediately noticed that she wasn’t anymore on the rock where he had left her. At first his angry, vengeful stare moved toward the tigers that were napping on the nearby hill but, as he looked down and saw the cold-meat preys near the lake, he left the fruits he had gathered and moved toward the water.

As he walked through it he immediately spotted something trashing down below in the murky waters and, being the hunter he was, he moved rapidly, catching a rather large cold-meat prey, which had its jaws clamped tightly on Ann’s body.

Roaring in terrible fury, he grabbed as much delicately as possible his only friend on the island and used his fingers to crack open the clamped shut jaws of the would-be watery hunter. Having freed Ann, keeping her shivering forms within his hand, he tossed the creature on land, before bringing Ann toward his face, talking to her with the language she had taught him.

“Ann is fine?”

As he repeated the gesture several times, Ann managed to snap out of the almost death experience she just had felt. Trembling, both from the cold and the fear, she looked at Kong, with tears in her eyes.

“Ann…Ann is fine. Kong saved Ann. Ann dead if not for Kong.”
“Kong defend Ann. Kong care for Ann. Ann friend of Kong.”

The massive ape had been working on that concept for quite some time, the ‘Hu-man’ creature had tried time and time again to explain him the word ‘Friend’ but he wasn’t able to understand it.

Until now.

As he had saw her in danger, he acted immediately to protect her. That was it. Kong had always been alone, since the death of his Family. What he saw as Family had to be what his Ann meant when using the word ‘Friend’.

At the same time, as Ann realized that Kong had used the word ‘Friend’ for her, she cried even harder, as she caressed and hugged one of Kong fingers, making sure to let him know that she was happy of being with him.

As Kong nuzzled a bit Ann, as he had started doing as of late to show his affection toward her, his stare fell on the massive creature that had tried to eat his friend. At first he thought about going there, rampaging, and reducing that little cold-meat hunter into a pulp, but, as Kong saw how big it was he decided to do a bit of experimentation based on what he had learned from Ann.

Grabbing the tail of the fish he left it atop the rocky formation and then, swiftly brought Ann back to his lair, before departing once more telling her that he was going hunting.

Ann, had passed from feeling completely terrified to feeling safer as she could be in the span of few minutes. Mentally damning herself for her own stupidity in thinking that she could have been safe in that lake, she began to release her anger and residual fear, by nibbling on some of the fruits that lay scattered around the lair.

‘If Kong hadn’t come in time…If he hadn’t seen me in the waters…I would be dead by now.

I can’t expose myself like this ever again.

I will always be by his side…that’s the only way for me to be safe.’

As evening came, and Ann had managed to calm down, she felt the ground shaking and smelled a different kind of scent in the air. It was different from the usual dinner that Kong brought to her. Curiously she tried to stand on her own but, be her fattened forms, be the tiredness in her muscles, she couldn’t manage.

Still, within few seconds she saw Kong moving closer to her, one massive arms behind his back. From his expression, she had grown quite used to him now, she could see he was happy and excited.

As he moved his arm toward her, he showed her his surprise.

On a platter of palm leaves, there was the same monster that had tried to eat her, having been skinned and cooked over the fire. Smiling at him, she thanked him by hugging his finger and then turned her attention toward the massive fish.

‘You tried to eat me today…But it will be in my stomach that you will end up…’

155221134.content:
Some time had passed since the incident with the monster sized cat fish and Ann Darrow had slowly recovered from that experience, partly by being cuddled by her friend Kong and, for the other part, by burying her fears with food. As days passed, Ann had begun to eat away at the meals that her friend brought her, stuffing herself so full that she could barely focus on what was going on her surroundings.

This massive increase, though, had it after-effects.

As the woman gorged on whatever the King of the island brought, her body began to metabolize everything she ate in adipose tissue all around her increasingly soft body. Kong had seen that his friend had seemed to have an increased appetite and made sure to bring her time and time again enough food to sate herself. Still, he noticed with disappointment, she barely seemed to be growing taller as he had hoped.
It was baffling for the massive ape.

Ann seemed to be growing bigger but, she hardly got taller. Apparently, she was still growing wider and softer. Still, he suspected that since she was so small compared to him it only meant that he had to wait longer for her to grow as big as he was. But, as patient as he was, he didn’t want to wait unnecessarily long so he decided to increase even more the amount of food he would bring to her. Thus decided, he began scouring the isle in search of something that could be of use to him to let the ‘growth’ process develop faster.

As Kong explored his territory, he suddenly realized that he hadn’t need to find anything new to bring her. He just had to adjust some of her current meals to be better, as he had done already before when he had skinned his first tiger and added the fruit juice on the meat as it cooked. With this new idea in mind he returned on his steps, moving back toward the deep jungle where he knew he could find many ‘ingredients’ for him to toy with.

Ann, instead was lazily lying down near the lair entrance atop of the mountain. She was currently resting after having eat a good portion of the fruits that her friend had left for her the night before. As she massaged her globular belly, she seemed barely able to remember about her previous life on the continent.

With all of that time spent on the island with Kong, those memories were getting hazy as if they had been nothing more than a dream. And with those memories gone, she also seemed not to care about her current figure, as it had slowly swelled with her current lifestyle. She had grown a lot since the lake incident, her belly now cascaded down onto her knees, when empty, divided in three thick belly rolls. Her breast, sagging with all the fat contained within, had lost any perkiness and were currently sliding on either side of her stomach, growing bigger as she piled on the pounds. Her arms and shoulder too had been affected by her rapid weight gain, having grown thicker and with large bingo wings that jiggled every time she moved.

Her hips and ass now, had grown so big that, for sure, she wouldn’t be able to pass through a door frame, if one was available on the island, and her ass cheeks, so filled with fat and cellulite, jiggled on their own as she moved even by a little, her legs.
But what was most impressive was her face. Her face had softened all over, gone was the angular cheeks, the nicely shaped lips she had once had, nowadays, her face drooped down toward her chins, having grown rich in fat. Her cheeks bulging out, as the fat within pushed a bit against her eyes, sign that soon she may have to squint in order to see. Her thin shapely neck vanished, obscured by the three large chins rolls that had grown in its place, as a fourth one was starting to emerge.

Although, she had noticed she was starting to have some issues in moving around and that the few ragged, torn, clothes she had found in his lair seemed always too small for her to wear.

But her mind was often turning more toward food than any other issues and so, without facing the issue, she had begun to be completely naked when she was at Kong’s lair. As she looked at the sky, Ann noticed that lunch time was still many hours away, and yet she was feeling mildly hungry. Once she would have simply waited for her friend to come back but, as hunger was becoming her only focus, she began the hard task of lifting herself from the soft bed she was on.

Before she could even move one of her legs, though, she smelled the aroma of a roasted something coming her way, clear sign that Kong was returning home. As she sniffed the air, she began to drool in anticipation. The aroma seemed similar to one of the many huge dinosaurs on the island but, it was somewhat different.

Kong climbed the steep mountain slowly, as he kept his grip on the new meal, he had prepared that morning for his friend. He wasn’t completely sure if what he had done was going to be good for his friend. As he had scoured the jungle, he had harvested plenty of resources and then tried to apply them as he had seen Ann doing before. Still, as he felt the weight of his preparation on his free hand, he could only smile in anticipation of how she would have reacted. As he appeared in her view, he saw that she was still where he had left her. This perplexed him a bit, for he wasn’t able to stay in one place that long but, he figured it had something to do with the growing out process she was on.

Moving closer to her, he slowly brought in her sight his hand, revealing three large lumps of meat, each one seemingly prepared in a different way. As he laid the three lumps in front of Ann, he then helped her stand and waddle slowly toward them as she looked at those impressed and with a hungry look in her eyes.

“has Kong done meat with no bright warm thing?”

“Kong has placed meat over bright warm thing. Kong used fruits and herbs on meat. Kong saw friend do same. Kong wants Ann happy.”

Ann was really astonished at her friend work.
She had always thought that the ape wasn’t a common specimen but this time he had tried something of his own. As she looked at the three lumps, noticing that each was almost as big as her, she licked her lips as she smelled the wonderful aroma coming from each. Moving closer to those, she tried to understand what he had done with each, as she also took a little morsel from them to taste it. The meat on the first one seemed to be glazed all over, which she confirmed as she cut a piece of it with her rough stone knife. As she tasted it she thought that this had to be dinosaur meat but was baffled on what Kong could have used to have the meat glazed and to still retain all the greasy juices inside.

“How Kong done this?”
“Kong used ‘this’ on the meat. As meat warmed Kong covered it slowly.”

As Kong spoke with the SLA, he indicated one of the tubular thingies she had already tasted before. As Ann recalled the sugary taste of the sludge, she understood that Kong had managed to caramelize the sugary sludge over the meat, greatly increasing its taste. Smiling, she moved toward the next one, tasting it as she did before. As she munched on the meat, she moaned in pleasure. This time the meat was so tender that it almost melted on her tongue.

“Kong saw Ann beat meat. Kong did same. Added paste from ball fruit. Brought meat to be warmed.”

As she kept tasting this second course, she realized that he had tried to tenderize the meat as she had tried to do one time before. In her case it was a failure, but with Kong’s strength the results were amazing. She then recognized also the faint taste over the meat itself, it was the same from that orange shaped fruit he had given her before. Gulping down the morsel she quickly moved over the third lumps realizing in fascination that this last one was way different from the other two. Where the previous two were chunks full of flesh, this last lump seemed to be mainly composed of thick fat. And since he seemed to have applied both the techniques from before on the last one, she could barely wait to taste it. Once again, her taste buds were assaulted by the delicious taste of it. Between the sugary glaze, the orange shaped fruit faint taste and the greasy fat, she began cutting bigger and bigger pieces from it, munching on them as fast as she could.

Kong watched passively as his friend ate with reckless abandon, watching her eat was something that always made him feel proud. Proud for his work, proud for having provided to her. Still, seeing how fast she was seeming to go, he realized that he had to step up his game. If he could manage to bring her food faster, she would also grow faster. Nuzzling her with a finger, he began walking away, going to hunt more food for her.

1552211342.content:
As days turned into weeks and weeks in months, Ann meals began to grow both in size and in frequency. The girl didn’t seem to mind though, she was enjoying too much the freedom of having nothing to do but focusing only on two things, Kong and food. As such, results were easy to see.

With her meals growing in portions sizes and being brought to her every few hours, Ann started to find herself behind in her eating schedule. Often she would find herself still munching on a meal as Kong brought a new one for her to consume, still, not wanting to sound ungrateful she tried to munch on them faster and faster, but the fattening diet she was on, was starting to create issues for her ever hungry stomach.

As time passed, and Ann grew bigger and fatter, she began to see that she was having difficulties in moving her arms or in grabbing her stone knife. As she began to lag behind the meals brought to her, Kong noticed that she was whining pitifully more and more often even with food around.
Mostly with food around.

As he inquired, he began to see where the issue was, although he couldn’t understand how it was possible. Apparently, his friend wasn’t able to move her arms as much as she could before, due to this she couldn’t eat or even ‘speak’ as much as she did in the past.

Kong was pleased with his friend growth, he had seen that she was starting to, finally grow a bit taller, although she still seemed to be growing much wider in comparison. So, he knew that she had to eat way more than what she was doing now. But he couldn’t stay and help her, since he had to hunt for her. But leaving her on her own wasn’t a solution since she wouldn’t be able to feed herself.
Suddenly, he heard the horn coming from the opposite side of the island and he realized that he had the solution right in his territory.

What he had always believed to be tiny dumb creatures, he now realized had to be similar creatures to his friend. And being similar, they for sure could help her keeping on growing. With this in mind, he quickly lifted Ann body from the ground, holding her within his arms, and he rapidly moved toward the wood wall where the creatures lived.

As he moved toward them, they creatures began to squeak as they always did, some with fear, some with joy. Kong though didn’t focus on that, he simply moved closer to the wall, and roared toward them, making them cower in fear as he tried to convey the message that he wanted them to come out.

The leader of the tribe crouched down in fear as he was on the wall, he wasn’t sure why the Mighty God had come to them. Then, as he looked to the God, he realized that it was holding something within the thickness of its arm. As he tried to see better, he saw a goldish tuft of hair and immediately realized that it was the white woman that they had given over to him so much time before. Although, when they had given her to him, she had been way smaller than the massive lump that the God was holding.

As he raised his voice, to stop his tribesmen from panicking, he looked toward the God, seeing as it had been acting rather calmly and, he even was afraid to think of it, rather peacefully, for his usual habits. Praying to his God Name, the leader then swiftly moved toward the base of the wall and ordered to open the gate and to low down the bridge that separated their walled town from the other side of the chasm where Kong was standing. Moving slowly, the leader emerged and walked, trembling in fear, over to his God, awaiting his command.

Under his surprised stare, his God inched closer to him, leaving in front of him the massive, 1,000 plus pounds, Ann Darrow as if it was waiting for him to do something. The leader moved his stare from the humongous woman in front of him and toward the God.

What the God wanted from him? Why bring the strangely engorged woman to him?
Was the God not satisfied with her?

As these thoughts ran through the leader mind, he suddenly reached a decision. Grabbing his lance he began to take aim to kill the woman that the God had brought to them but, just as he raised the lance to pierce Ann’s heart, she screamed loudly and that changed the situation quite a bit.

Kong had brought his friend toward the tiny creatures, hoping that they would understand and help but, he saw the tiny creature looking at his Ann strangely. Then, suddenly Kong heard Ann scream in fear and that caused him to roar threateningly toward the tribe’s leader. The poor man, facing alone the full wrath of his God, hastily threw away his lance, backing away from the woman a bit, but doing so his God grunted menacingly. As he then inched closer, he saw that Kong return to calmness.

The leader racked his brain trying to understand. The God didn’t want the woman harmed and, neither he wanted him away from her. So, what was that the God did want? At this point, Ann, that had been silent up to that moment, tried to communicate with the native standing before her.
As Kong had moved her, she had been puzzled but, during the trip he had explained her that he was going to bring her someplace where they could help her. She would have never thought that her friend Kong would have brought her back to the village.

“Listen to me. Do you understand me? …? No. Of course not. Look, I need help. Kong wants you to take me in…I’m hungry…you get it?”

As Ann tried to explain, the leader only got more and more confused, until a large rumbling sound enveloped them. The leader, then, looked at the white woman with new eyes, seeing as her massive body rumbled hungrily. As he stared at her he saw that her arms didn’t manage to reach her mouth and so he finally understood what the God wanted.

Calling his tribe, they quickly took in the White Woman, and thought that the situation was resolved as he saw the God move away.

But barely few minutes had passed, and the God had suddenly returned! The leader felt his heartbeat pumping faster and faster, as he raced through the village toward the gate, until he stopped seeing as his God was leaving some massive lumps of cooked food on the gate, pointing with his finger toward the White Woman.

It was this that made realize to the Tribe leader what was going on.

Their God had chosen the White Woman as its Bride and they had now been tasked with the duty of keeping her safe and sated. The leader, finally getting some grasp on the situation, began relaying the news all over the tribe, making sure to have their new Goddess treated with utmost respect.

As Ann started to get used to the treatment of the natives, she also began to teach a few of them the same language she had taught her friend Kong. Alas, she noticed, the natives learned it at a much slower rate than her Friend did but, with time, she managed to have at least the Leader to ‘speak’ it fluently.

During this time, she learned that his name was Kaak and that they considered Kong their deity. With this information she realized that by proxy, she too was now their Goddess and so she accepted the pampering that they devolved upon her. Thanks to this, Ann began to steadily grow once more. With a few natives, which only duty was to bring food to her mouth, constantly surrounding her she truly felt like a Goddess, although she missed the times where she was alone with her Friend.

Kong was happy that Ann was growing bigger once more but, he also sadly realized that he was alone, again. At first he kept bringing warm food to Ann but, after a while he noticed that the tiny creatures that were taking care of her had their own ways of preparing food and so he began to simply lay at their gates his kills, letting the creatures preparing them.

One day, as he had now got used to just bring the raw food to the village before scampering back to hunt for more, he heard the horn from the village. At first he ignored it but, as it began to echoes around him more and more, Kong began to run at full speed toward them, afraid that something may have happened to Ann.
Roaring in fury he finally made it to the village, ready to destroy anything that may have threatened his only Friend, but there seemed to be nothing wrong there. He didn’t smell no enemy, nor any trace of blood or of a fight.

But as he turned toward the village, he looked incredulous at what he was seeing.

Near the gate, on a massive construction, he saw Ann laying down, slowly and tiredly, wobbling her fattened arms toward him, a massive smile plastered on her face. Kong couldn’t tear his stare from what he was seeing. Atop of the wood wall, on the wooden construction, Ann was laying down, constantly being fed by the natives but in full view to him. As he signed to her asking how she was doing, he was surprised when one of the creatures answered in her stead.

From him Kong learned that Ann had taught them their language, so that Kong could have more friends than just Ann. The monster sized Ape, then felt in his hearth that Ann was much more than a friend, much more than a family. He had thought that she had forgotten him when, instead, she had given him a much greater gift.

Moving closer, he pushed his arm long over the chasm opening between the solid ground where he stood and the wooden wall protecting the city, managing just right to reach his beloved friend. Ann, although being fed by the natives, opened her arms wide, as much as she could, and solidly grabbed one of Kong’s finger in, what had become after so much time, her gesture of affection toward him.

Kong, feeling reinvigorated, thumped hard his pectorals and roared in joy, vowing with himself to re-double his efforts to see his friend grow more. After that he quickly moved back to the jungle, returning quickly after leaving two massive dinosaur corpses near the gates, seeing with a smile as the natives were quickly moving those inside, after hacking them into smaller pieces.

15522113424.content:
He stared at the horizon, another dawn in the hellish place he found himself trapped on. First there had been the monsters living in that hellhole, then his would-be girl vanishing and finally his inability to return to the mainland. He had managed to survive somehow, escaping the monsters, foraging food here and there, finding shelters wherever he managed to find safety.

But, if at first, he had managed to keep his spirits high with hope… as months passed, he began to brood over himself, as madness began to overcome his loneliness.

Without noticing he had even become to talk to himself, keeping long discussion with his own self, often passing hours simply repeating his name.

Jack Driscoll.

All this changed though when he saw Her.

He was hiding in one of his usual spots, at the base of the tallest mountain, having noticed that creatures tended to avoid that place, when he saw that monstrous ape climbing down from it, carrying His Ann within his arms. That sight gave him an objective from the mere surviving. From then on, he began to try and shadow every movement that Ann did, along with the monster. As little as she moved.

With time spent on shadowing her he began to see that Ann seemed to be growing… ‘healthier’ and yet, not only she didn’t seem unhappy, but he himself began to find her even more attractive. It was strange, really, he had always thought that Miss Darrow had always been the most beautiful girl in existence, that nothing could have made her more beautiful than how she appeared.

But as time passed with him spying on her, seeing as she began to grow, he found himself even more attracted to her.

Or, at least, that’s what the Voices told to him.

As time passed, Jack noticed that Ann kept growing, unrelenting, her mass began to billow everywhere. He had scrounged up from a pile of human remains a binocular of sorts and, with it, he began to spy that much closer to his Ann, feeling as if he was standing beside her, talking to her, comforting her in her state of being hostage of that monster. As he watched her grow fatter and fatter, he surmised that it had to be the monster idea to keep her there, to have her all for himself, but he also began to find her more fascinating than ever.

In the rare times when he rested, he found himself fantasizing on having her for himself, of having her grow even more, of feeding her by his own hands, seeing that angelic smile plastered on her face.

But when he saw the monster moving her, having to carry her with both of his arms, he began to fear that her time might have come. Fear gripped his hearth as he began tracking them, carefully avoiding the creatures that roamed the island, creatures bent into killing him and devouring him. It took him weeks but, he managed to find them.

And he saw her again.

This time she was being held by the natives of that hellhole, which seemed rather pleased with themselves to keep fattening her. For a moment, Jack wondered how she could stand all that. How could the little Miss Darrow be feeling being subjected to that treatment but, as he took shelter in a cave near the tribal village, he never saw her cry.

Not even once.

His madness returned, taunting him from every side, making him believe that she too must have wanted it, that she had grown now attached to that monster that had captured her so long ago. In this frenzied state, Jack, promised himself that he was going to free her. That he was going to find a way to bring her back.

But, to do that, he had to return where everything had started.

Where all this nightmare had begun.

He left the cave he had found refuge in and began the long and hard trek to return to the beach where they first had arrived. He hoped to find a sign, something that would help him in the quest he was in.

To save Miss Darrow from that monster. To bring her back to their homeland.

As he avoided the many traps that Skull Island threw at him, often by the hairs, he finally managed to return to the coast. Finding nothing.
There was nothing there for him.

No answers, no tools, nothing.

In anger, losing the last scrap of good sense he had had up to that point, he quickly erected a pyre, with logs and scraps of wood he rapidly built a massive pyre, one that, he was sure, was going to attract all manners of creatures to him. So that he could finally die. The voices kept repeating him that he had failed her, that he had always failed at her safety. Madness overtook him, in a brutal breaking point his mind simply went away, leaving behind a mangled corpse moving by its own self destructive will.

Using the last reserves of fuel he had on himself, stored for the emergencies, he quickly lighted up his own funeral pyre, already prepared to end his own misery. But, just as he was ready to let himself go within the roaring flames, he heard a sound he had heard such a long time before.

As his rational mind began to return, he turned his stare on the horizon, seeing as a shape began to emerge from the fog constantly enveloping the island.

It was a ship.

A warship, to be exact.


A few hours later, feeling drained and wet, Jack found himself seating inside one of the cabins of the massive vessel, nursing within his hands a mug of hot coffee. Looking into the dark liquid he began muttering to himself a bit, cackling as he realized that he still had time to do his duty. To save Miss Ann Darrow from the beast lurking in the island. But, to do that, he was going to need the help of the entire crew of that ship.

As he began to lay down his plans, he often wandered throughout the ship, finding himself talking with every crew member, asking them opinions, promising riches beyond compare, sweet talking them into be more accepting with the mission he was brewing within his mind.

After all, he had spent months on the damned place and knew it, mostly, as the back of his hands.

For a single moment, Jack asked himself what he was doing. Here he had the opportunity to return to his home, to his family. He had the chance of forgetting that nightmare and start a new life back in his country and, why not, to have his own girl to see grow, to fatten her up to the point of immobility.

But the Voices, angry with him of being ignored, kept repeating to him that he still had a duty to perform.

He still had to take back what was his by rights.

It nearly took him two weeks to have most of the crew on his side, when he went and discussed things with the commander of the ship. As he talked with him, he also learned why they were there. It hadn’t started as a rescue mission. In fact, they were not aware of anyone having come to the island before.

They were there as an escort mission.

As the commander said it, ‘Some egg-heads wanted to explore this uncharted rock. We’re here to provide support and bring them back.’ As Jack, assisted by his Voices, kept discussing the matter with the man in front of him, he began to turn the truths into lies, making sure to get the help he needed while delivering false promises.

In this way, after long discussions, he managed to get himself counted within the numbers of people that were going into the island to get their men’s back. The scientists and explorers who had come to the island, had done so almost three weeks ago and, by Jack estimations, they were already lost. But he never said that, instead he told them that he was going to help them in retrieving them. When, in truth, he had only one person to save.

Jack Driscoll, having made himself known to the crew as the man who had survived almost one year on that island, made sure that all people on board were listening to him, taking his advices to their very hearth, making sure that every word he said about Skull Island became like words taken from the Holy book.

Making sure that his every word became Law.

Jack had already the plan formed into his mind, he was going to trade the lives of the same people who had started to believe in him, in order to save the life of Ann Darrow. Even considering her size, he already knew how to transport her away from that hellish place. Along with the warship there was also a barge, used to move materials that the would-be explorers had requested to make a base within the island.

Jack already planned to dump all that material to the sea, to have enough space to save His woman. As to how move her from the tribal village toward the sea, he already had made a few questions to some of the engineers on board, making sure to tell them that if they were to save these people, they for sure were going to have them moved from a high place toward the sea.

So, a platform capable of sustaining tons was needed, along with the means to having it lift. Jack, having managed to replace his presence with the one of the commander within the hearts of the crew, was now the de-facto owner of the ship.

All he had to do was to put his plan in motion…
